errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

toast.savePreferencesFailed: Failed to save your preferences. Please try again.
toast.completeFailed: Failed to complete onboarding. Please try again.

errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.description: We encountered an error during the onboarding process. Please try again.
errorBoundary.supportNote: If this problem persists, please contact support or check the documentation for help.

welcome.title: Welcome to Kotoba
welcome.subtitle: Select the features you're interested in to personalize your experience

contextualDictation.title: Contextual Dictation
contextualDictation.description: Quick voice input in any application for seamless speech-to-text

noteTaking.title: Note Taking
noteTaking.description: Capture thoughts and ideas through speech with smart formatting

meetingTranscriptions.title: Meeting Transcriptions
meetingTranscriptions.description: Record and transcribe meetings and conversations with high accuracy

voiceCommands.title: Voice Commands
voiceCommands.description: Control your apps hands-free - act on tasks with natural voice commands

toast.maxFeatures: You can select up to {{max}} features
toast.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one feature to personalize your experience

welcome.note: Your choices help personalize setup - all features remain available anytime.

permissions.title: Setup Permissions
permissions.subtitle: Kotoba needs a few permissions to work properly

allGranted.title: All permissions granted
allGranted.description: You're all set! You can continue to the next step.

microphone.title: Microphone Access
microphone.description: Required for recording and transcribing audio
microphone.deniedHelp: Please grant microphone access in System Settings

accessibility.title: Accessibility Access
accessibility.description: Required for pasting transcription and global keyboard shortcuts (macOS only)
accessibility.deniedHelp: Add Kotoba to Accessibility in System Settings

discovery.title: How did you discover Kotoba?
discovery.subtitle: This helps us understand where our users come from

toast.selectSource: Please select how you discovered Kotoba

modelSelection.title: Set Up Ollama
modelSelection.subtitle: Connect to Ollama to enable AI text formatting. You can skip this step if Ollama is not installed.

ollama.urlHint: Make sure Ollama is running before connecting.
ollama.connectionFailed: Could not connect to Ollama. Please check the URL and make sure Ollama is running.
ollama.saveFailed: Failed to save Ollama settings. Please try again.
ollama.noModels: No models found. Please install a model in Ollama first.

local.downloadingDescription: Setting up local model for private, offline transcription

completion.title: Setup Complete!

community.title: Join our Community
community.description: Get help, share feedback, and connect with other users

items.pushToTalk: Use your push-to-talk shortcut to start transcribing
items.widget: Click the floating widget for quick access
items.settings: Explore Settings for more customization options

completion.info: All settings can be changed anytime in the application preferences.
completion.infoLocalModel: Your selected local model is ready to use offline.

notifications.recordingSaved: Your recording is saved. You can access it in History.

emptyTranscript.title: No speech detected
emptyTranscript.description: Try speaking louder or closer to the mic

modelMissing.title: No model available
modelMissing.description: Download a local model or switch to cloud

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.description: Configure general application preferences and behavior

dictation.title: Dictation
dictation.description: Configure speech recognition and dictation settings

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.description: Customize your application behavior and appearance

toast.updateFailed: Failed to update preferences. Please try again.

launchAtLogin.label: Launch at login
launchAtLogin.description: Automatically start the application when you log in

showWidgetWhileInactive.label: Show widget while inactive
showWidgetWhileInactive.description: Keep the widget visible on screen when not recording

showInDock.label: Show app in dock
showInDock.description: Display the application icon in the macOS dock

muteSystemAudio.label: Mute system audio during recording
muteSystemAudio.description: Silence system output while capturing microphone audio

autoDictateOnNewNote.label: Auto-dictate on new note
autoDictateOnNewNote.description: Automatically start dictation when creating a new note

language.label: Language
language.description: Choose the language used throughout the app

restartDialog.title: Restart required
restartDialog.description: Restart Kotoba to apply language changes. You can also apply on next start.

toast.applyNextStart: Language will apply on next start.

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.description: Advanced configuration options and experimental features

preloadModel.label: Preload Whisper Model
preloadModel.description: Load AI model at startup for faster transcription

updateChannel.label: Update Channel
updateChannel.description: Choose which release channel to receive updates from

toast.updateFailed: Failed to change update channel. Please try again.

telemetry.label: Anonymous Telemetry
telemetry.description: Help improve Kotoba by sharing anonymous usage data.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: Actions here are irreversible and will delete all your data

reset.label: Reset App
reset.description: Delete all data and start fresh

dialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
dialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete:
dialog.footer: The app will restart with a fresh installation.

toast.settingsUpdateFailed: Failed to update settings. Please try again.
toast.telemetryUpdateFailed: Failed to update telemetry settings. Please try again.
toast.resetFailed: Failed to reset app. Please try again.

about.title: About
about.description: Version information, resources, and support links

resources.title: Resources
resources.description: Get help, report issues, and stay updated with the latest changes

discord.title: Discord Community
discord.description: Join our community for support and discussions

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Get in touch with our team for support and inquiries

empty.defaultDescription: Your recent transcriptions will appear here.

dictation.title: Dictation
dictation.description: Configure dictation, language, microphone, and AI model settings

autoDetect.label: Auto detect language
autoDetect.description: Automatically detect spoken language. Turn off to select specific languages.
autoDetect.tooltip: Disable auto detection to select languages. Selecting specific languages may increase accuracy.

microphone.label: Microphone
microphone.noDevicesHelp: No microphones detected. Please check your audio devices.

formatting.label: Formatting
formatting.description: Apply punctuation and structure to your transcriptions.
formatting.disabledTooltip: Sync a language model or select Kotoba Cloud transcription to enable formatting.
formatting.modelDescription: Choose the model used to format your transcription.
formatting.noLanguageModels: Formatting won't run - no language model available.

toast.saveFailed: Failed to save formatting settings. Please try again.

shortcuts.title: Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Configure keyboard shortcuts for dictation and hands-free modes

pushToTalk.label: Push to talk
pushToTalk.description: Hold to dictate while key is pressed

handsFree.label: Hands-free mode
handsFree.description: Start/stop dictation by pressing once to start and pressing again to stop

pasteLastTranscript.label: Paste last transcript
pasteLastTranscript.description: Paste your most recent transcription into the active app

newNote.label: New note
newNote.description: Open notes window and create a new note

validation.tooManyKeys: Too many keys - use {{max}} or fewer
validation.alreadyAssigned: Shortcut already assigned to another action
validation.addModifier: Add a modifier key like Cmd, Ctrl, or Fn
validation.duplicateModifierPairs: Can't use both left and right {{modifier}} together
validation.overlapsWithPushToTalk: This overlaps with your Push-to-talk shortcut and may cause issues

empty.title: No notes yet
empty.description: Create your first note to get started

toast.upgradedToRichNotes: Your notes have been upgraded to rich notes with markdown formatting.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Note
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone and the note will be permanently removed.

connect.title: Connect your calendar
connect.description: Connect your calendar to get started

toast.updateFailed: Failed to set default {{modelType}} model. Please try again.

changeDefaultDialog.title: Change Default Model
changeDefaultDialog.description: Are you sure you want to set "{{modelName}}" as your default {{modelType}} model?

removeDialog.title: Remove Provider Connection
removeDialog.description: Are you sure you want to remove your {{provider}} connection? This will disconnect and remove all synced models from this provider. This action cannot be undone.

toast.configSaveFailed: Failed to save {{provider}} configuration. Please try again.
toast.removeFailed: Failed to remove {{provider}} provider. Please try again.

syncedModels.title: Synced Models

toast.removeFailed: Failed to remove model. Please try again.
toast.defaultLanguageFailed: Failed to set default language model. Please try again.
toast.defaultEmbeddingFailed: Failed to set default embedding model. Please try again.

syncedModels.errorDefaultRemove: Please select another model as default before removing this model.

empty.title: No models synced yet.
empty.description: Connect to a provider and sync models to see them here.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Deletion
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to remove "{{modelName}}" from your synced models? This action cannot be undone.

syncDialog.title: Select {{provider}} {{modelType}}Models
syncDialog.description: Choose which {{modelType}}models you want to sync from {{provider}}.

toast.syncFailed: Failed to sync models to database. Please try again.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Model
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this model? This action cannot be undone and you will need to download the model again if you want to use it.
